headline: A Fresh Look At Avery Dennison (AVY) Valuation After Recent Share Price Moves
summary: Avery Dennison snapshot after recent moves Avery Dennison (AVY) has seen mixed share performance recently, with a small gain over the past month and a stronger move in the past 3 months, putting fresh attention on its valuation and fundamentals. See our latest analysis for Avery Dennison. At a share price of $185.51, Avery Dennison has a 90 day share price return of 6.45%, while the 1 year total shareholder return of 2.02% points to steadier, income inclusive gains rather than rapid...
